content: $ brew install hugo -f yml $ hugo version hugo v0.94.2+extended darwin/arm64 BuildDate=unknown $ hugo new site notes $ cd notes $ git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git themes/PaperMod $ echo "theme: \"PaperMod\"" >> config.yml

How much - how little - is within our power
